entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
